医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
随着一次性电子烟的流行，戒烟者的电子烟使用量急剧增加在年轻化人口和一次性电子烟的推动下，英格兰戒烟者中使用电子烟的比例从 2013 年的 2% 飙升至 2024 年的 20% 以上，引发了对健康影响和吸烟复吸的质疑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Vaping-among-ex-smokers-grows-sharply-as-disposable-e-香烟-take-hold.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Vaping-among-ex-smokers-grows-sharply-as-disposable-e-香烟-take-hold.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bffbbc9d-b033-454c-84ea-c40b43594ebb Sun, 24 Nov 2024 21:40:00 -0500 Vaping among ex-smokers grows sharply as disposable e-cigarettes take hold
英国色盲学生的无声抗争一位作者警告说，大约 45 万名儿童在英国教育系统中表现不佳，因为他们有特殊的教育需求和残疾 (SEND)，而大多数学校和当地教育当局实际上并未认识到他们的特殊教育需求和残疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/The-silent-struggles-of-color-blind-students-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/The-silent-struggles-of-color-blind-students-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64782f02-ee89-46b5-a4d6-730279b58878 Sun, 24 Nov 2024 21:29:28 -0500 The silent struggles of color blind students in the UK
从子宫到中年：产前免疫紊乱重塑记忆和认知衰老产前接触母体促炎细胞因子会影响后代的记忆和免疫功能，并在 50 多年来出现性别特异性效应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/From-womb-to-midlife-Prenatal-immune-disruptions-reshape-memory-and-cognitive-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/From-womb-to-midlife-Prenatal-immune-disruptions-reshape-memory-and-cognitive-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40c10f9b-d892-4e72-b4df-3e4feb8f23e2 Sun, 24 Nov 2024 21:21:00 -0500 From womb to midlife: Prenatal immune disruptions reshape memory and cognitive aging
夜间人造光会增加失眠风险，尤其是在较小的城市社交媒体和卫星数据显示，夜间户外人造光与中国城市失眠率上升之间存在密切联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Artificial-nighttime-light-increases-insomnia-risk-special-in-smaller-cities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Artificial-nighttime-light-increases-insomnia-risk-special-in-smaller-cities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2d11388-ff96-4349-859b-227a92f6eb2c Sun, 24 Nov 2024 19:13:00 -0500 Artificial nighttime light increases insomnia risk, especially in smaller cities
深度学习利用 RhoFold+ 彻底改变 RNA 3D 结构预测研究人员推出了 RhoFold+，这是一种突破性的深度学习模型，能够以前所未有的准确性和效率预测 RNA 3D 结构，解决结构生物学中的关键挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Deep-learning-revolutionizes-RNA-3D-struction-prediction-with-RhoFold2b.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Deep-learning-revolutionizes-RNA-3D-struction-prediction-with-RhoFold2b.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3baa27c-cc7a-4221-b610-a1f4226a6c4a Sun, 24 Nov 2024 18:53:00 -0500 Deep learning revolutionizes RNA 3D structure prediction with RhoFold+
可穿戴超声波传感器彻底改变了连续血压监测研究人员验证了一种新型可穿戴超声血压 (BP) 传感器，证实了其在不同临床环境中的准确性和安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Wearable-ultrasound-sensor-revolutionizes-连续-血液-压力-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241124/Wearable-ultrasound-sensor-revolutionizes-连续-血液-压力-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b18111a-cdd0-47e4-ba10-3e2e84dc737b Sun, 24 Nov 2024 17:56:00 -0500 Wearable ultrasound sensor revolutionizes continuous blood pressure monitoring
高尔基体在增强 T 细胞抗癌功能方面发挥着至关重要的作用高尔基体对蛋白质进行修饰、分类和包装，以将其发送到最终目的地，无论是在细胞内还是细胞外。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Golgi-apparatus-plays-crucial-role-in-enhancing-T-cell-function-against-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Golgi-apparatus-plays-crucial-role-in-enhancing-T-cell-function-against-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9610f6fe-0287-46ba-a95e-e868d189485c Sat, 23 Nov 2024 23:50:46 -0500 Golgi apparatus plays crucial role in enhancing T-cell function against cancer
研究表明，将家务活视为学习机会可以鼓励孩子的自主性耶鲁大学研究人员的一项新研究表明，如果孩子穿衣服或做其他简单的家务活被视为学习机会，父母就不太可能干预。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Framing-chores-as-learning-opportunities-encourages-child-autonomy-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Framing-chores-as-learning-opportunities-encourages-child-autonomy-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ae4c5e6-9590-46ad-8580-aa1b53890f08 Sat, 23 Nov 2024 23:45:32 -0500 Framing chores as learning opportunities encourages child autonomy, study shows
酒精使用被发现是青少年吸食大麻的主要因素UTHealth Houston 本月在《社会科学与医学》杂志上发表的研究表明，与人口因素无关，饮酒是青少年吸食大麻的最常见预测因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Alcohol-use-found-to-be-major-factor-in-cannabis-vaping-among-youth-and-young-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/Alcohol-use-found-to-be-major-factor-in-cannabis-vaping-among-youth-and-young-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07ac264c-42bf-4ef0-b36a-9f85a68097fc Sat, 23 Nov 2024 23:37:01 -0500 Alcohol use found to be major factor in cannabis vaping among youth and young adults
NREM 睡眠通过大脑同步提高认知能力众所周知，睡眠可以增强认知能力，但其潜在的神经机制，尤其是与非快速眼动 (NREM) 睡眠相关的神经机制，在很大程度上仍未得到探索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/NREM-sleep-boosts-cognitive-performance-through-brain-synchronization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241123/NREM-sleep-boosts-cognitive-performance-through-brain-synchronization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0f4d81d-f17e-4d3e-a354-daad1a71e90f Sat, 23 Nov 2024 23:20:38 -0500 NREM sleep boosts cognitive performance through brain synchronization
